issue.title: [fund.ts.v2] Certain comparison operators of observer_ptr do not match synopsis

discussion.p: In N4529 [memory.observer.ptr.special] paragraphs 15, 17 and 19, the >, <= and >= operators of observer_ptr are shown as

blockquote.pre: template <class W> bool operator>(observer_ptr<W> p1, observer_ptr<W> p2);

discussion.p: whereas in [header.memory.synop] they are shown as

blockquote.pre: template <class W1, class W2> bool operator>(observer_ptr<W1> p1, observer_ptr<W2> p2);

discussion.p: Given that the specification of operator< took special care to support hetergeneous types, presumably the second version is intended.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4529.

blockquote.pre: -15- template <class W1, class W2> bool operator>(observer_ptr<W1> p1, observer_ptr<W2> p2);
-17- template <class W1, class W2> bool operator<=(observer_ptr<W1> p1, observer_ptr<W2> p2);
-19- template <class W1, class W2> bool operator>=(observer_ptr<W1> p1, observer_ptr<W2> p2);
